casebody.data:
US BANK NA as Legal Title Trustee for Truman 2013 Sc3 Title Trust, Plaintiff-Appellee
v.
Sylvia LINDIG, Defendant-Appellant
and
Robert Bomar Jeffcoat; Wells Fargo Bank, N.A.; Greg Shugars dba North Shore Builders, Defendants-Appellees,
and
John Does 1-50; Jane Does 1-50; DOE Partnerships 1-50; DOE Corporations 1-50; DOE Entities 1-50; and DOE Governmental Units 1-50, Defendants NO. CAAP-16-0000888 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. MARCH 27, 2018

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Vacated. Remanded.
